pyio_utility module¶

This module defines the utility methods and classes necessary for the pyio package.

Todo

None

pyioflash.pyio_utility._first_true(iterable, predictor)¶

Returns the first true value in the iterable according to predictor.

Return type

Any

pyioflash.pyio_utility._filter_transpose(source, names)¶

Returns a list of named members extracted from a collection object (source) based on a list (names)

Return type

List[List[Any]]

pyioflash.pyio_utility._set_is_unique(source, sequence, mask=None)¶

Returns (True) if no member of sequence is found in source, with ability to mask members of source from comparision to members of sequence

Return type

bool

pyioflash.pyio_utility._reduce_str(value, sentinal='_')¶

Provides reduced string with intervineing spaces replaced, and trailing removed

pyioflash.pyio_utility.open_hdf5(*args, **kwargs)¶

Context manager for working with a hdf5 file; using a h5py file handle

class pyioflash.pyio_utility.NameData(numbers, directory='', header='', footer='', extention='', numform='04d')¶

Storage class for containing file names as a list for hdf5 files to be processed; the list, NameData.files, is automatically generated based on keyword arguments

NameData assumes file names (and paths) of the form:

directory + header + numbers + footer + extension

Example

if the files to be processed were:

  • ../out/INS_LidDr_Cavity_hdf5_plt_cnt_0000

  • ../out/INS_LidDr_Cavity_hdf5_plt_cnt_0001

  • ../out/INS_LidDr_Cavity_hdf5_plt_cnt_0002

the following would be the values for attributes:

  • numbers = [0, 1, 2]

  • directory = ‘../out/’

  • header = ‘INS_LidDr_Cavity_hdf5_plt_cnt_’

  • footer = ‘’

  • extension = ‘’

  • numform = ‘04d’

Parameters

  • numbers (Iterable) – list of output file numbers (or names)

  • directory (str) – relative file path to output files

  • header (str) – leading file name text

  • footer (str) – following file name text

  • extention (str) – file name extention (must include ‘.’)

  • numform (str) – number format for file names e.g., 04d -> 0000

Variables

  • length (int) – number of filenames - calculated

  • names (list) – list of full filenames and paths - calculated

directory = ''¶
extention = ''¶
footer = ''¶
classmethod from_name(name, **kwargs)¶

Class method to create a NameData instance with a single string

Note

Accepts same keyword arguments as NameData()

Parameters

name (str) – output file name

classmethod from_strings(names, **kwargs)¶

Class method to create a NameData instance with a list of strings

Note

Accepts same keyword arguments as NameData()

Parameters

names (list) – list of output file names

header = ''¶
numform = '04d'¶
class pyioflash.pyio_utility.Plane(time=None, cut=None, axis='z')¶

Data object for defining a 2d cut-plane at a give time for use in plotting

Variables

time – time or index (e.g., key) associated with the desired plane

axis = 'z'¶
cut = None¶
time = None¶
